channel.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters
channel.description: Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub)

image.title: China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters

item.title: 中国大使馆警告韩国整形手术风险
item.description: China's embassy in Seoul has warned citizens against the dangers of having plastic surgery done in South Korea, from the risk of death to major facial changes that make it difficult to pass through immigration checks.翻译:中国驻首尔大使馆警告公民注意在韩国进行整形手术的危险，从死亡风险到导致难以通过移民检查的重大面部变化。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 克里姆林宫表示对阿根廷不加入金砖国家的决定感到遗憾，希望阿根廷重新考虑
item.description: The Kremlin said on Friday it regretted Argentina's decision not to join the BRICS bloc of developing nations and hoped that Buenos Aires would reconsider.翻译:克里姆林宫周五表示，对阿根廷决定不加入金砖国家集团表示遗憾，并希望布宜诺斯艾利斯重新考虑。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 早盘竞价：热门筹码、中国股市下跌和英国零售业低迷
item.description: A look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan翻译:迈克·多兰 (Mike Dolan) 对美国和全球市场未来一天的展望
item.author: Reuters

item.title: ABB中国业务遭美国国会调查
item.description: Swiss engineering group ABB's operations in China are being scrutinised by two U.S. Congress committees dedicated to investigating security threats and risks posed by Beijing, documents showed on Friday.翻译:周五的文件显示，瑞士工程集团 ABB 在中国的业务正在接受美国国会两个委员会的审查，这两个委员会致力于调查北京带来的安全威胁和风险。
item.author: John Revill

item.title: 独家：中国命令负债累累的地方政府停止一些基础设施项目-消息人士
item.description: China has instructed heavily indebted local governments to delay or halt some state-funded infrastructure projects, three people with knowledge of the situation said, as Beijing struggles to contain debt risks even as it tries to stimulate the economy.翻译:三名知情人士表示，中国已指示负债累累的地方政府推迟或停止一些国家资助的基础设施项目，因为北京在努力刺激经济的同时也难以控制债务风险。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾与加拿大签署防务合作协议
item.description: The Philippines and Canada signed a memorandum of understanding on defence cooperation on Friday, a move which Manila's defence minister said could later lead to a troop pact between the two countries.翻译:菲律宾和加拿大周五签署了一份防务合作谅解备忘录，马尼拉国防部长表示，此举可能导致两国随后达成驻军协议。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 联合国预计国际旅游业将于2024年全面复苏
item.description: Global tourism is set to fully recover from the pandemic in 2024 as international tourist arrivals will likely be 2% more numerous than in 2019, the United Nations' World Tourism Organisation said on Friday.翻译:联合国世界旅游组织周五表示，全球旅游业将于 2024 年从疫情中全面复苏，国际游客人数可能比 2019 年增加 2%。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 解释者：红海破坏对欧洲经济意味着什么？
item.description: Weeks of attacks by Iranian-backed Houthi militants on vessels in the Red Sea have disrupted shipping in the Suez Canal, the fastest sea route between Asia and Europe carrying 12% of global container traffic.翻译:伊朗支持的胡塞武装分子对红海船只进行了数周的袭击，导致苏伊士运河的航运中断。苏伊士运河是亚洲和欧洲之间最快的海上航线，承载着全球集装箱运输量的 12%。
item.author: Mark John

item.title: 中国基金经理自掏腰包推出股票基金
item.description: In the face of intense pressure from authorities to help revive a sickly stock market, Chinese fund management companies are increasingly launching equity funds that are bankrolled mostly by the firm's own money.翻译:面对当局要求重振病态股市的巨大压力，中国基金管理公司越来越多地推出主要由公司自有资金提供资金的股票基金。
item.author: Samuel Shen, Vidya Ranganathan

item.title: 美国希望日本造船厂帮助军舰做好在亚洲作战的准备
item.description: The United States and Japan are looking to make a deal for Japanese shipyards to regularly overhaul and maintain U.S. Navy warships so they can stay in Asian waters ready for any potential conflict, U.S. Ambassador to Japan Rahm Emanuel said on Friday.翻译:美国驻日本大使拉姆·伊曼纽尔周五表示，美国和日本正在寻求达成协议，让日本造船厂定期检修和维护美国海军军舰，以便它们能够留在亚洲水域，为任何潜在的冲突做好准备。
item.author: John Geddie, Tim Kelly

item.title: 三得利首席执行官：印度成为投资焦点，而中国面临风险
item.description: Japanese drinks maker Suntory is prioritising expansion in India while taking a cautious stance on business in China, especially given concerns over spy laws recently used to detain foreign workers, Chief Executive Takeshi Niinami said in an interview.翻译:日本饮料制造商三得利首席执行官新波武史在接受采访时表示，公司优先考虑在印度扩张，同时对中国业务持谨慎态度，特别是考虑到最近用于拘留外国工人的间谍法的担忧。
item.author: Divya Chowdhury, Rocky Swift

item.title: 中东紧张局势支撑油价每周上涨
item.description: Oil was little changed on Friday and heading for a weekly gain, as Middle East tensions and oil output disruptions caused by cold weather in the U.S., the world's biggest producer, balanced concerns about the health of the Chinese and global economies.翻译:由于中东紧张局势和全球最大产油国美国寒冷天气造成石油产量中断，平衡了对中国和全球经济健康状况的担忧，周五油价变化不大，并有望周度上涨。
item.author: Alex Lawler

item.title: 红海航运袭击给中国出口商造成延误、成本上升的压力
item.description: For Chinese businessman Han Changming, disruptions to Red Sea freight are threatening the survival of his trading company in the eastern province of Fujian.翻译:对于中国商人韩昌明来说，红海货运中断正威胁着他位于东部福建省的贸易公司的生存。
item.author: Samuel Shen, Casey Hall, Ellen Zhang

item.title: 中国与毛泽东时代的增长调情
item.description: The latest readouts on economic and population trends in China are remarkable, highlighting the immense long-term challenges ahead and dragging the growth profile of the world's second-largest economy back to the insular days of the 1970s.翻译:关于中国经济和人口趋势的最新数据引人注目，突显了未来巨大的长期挑战，并将世界第二大经济体的增长状况拖回了 20 世纪 70 年代的孤立时期。
item.author: Jamie McGeever

item.title: 美国贸易代表办公室副代表比安奇将卸任亚洲最高贸易官员职务
item.description: The Biden administration's top trade official for Asia, Sarah Bianchi, is stepping down as the U.S. Trade Representative's office plots its next moves on trade talks with Indo-Pacific countries after failing to reach a deal in November, the White House confirmed on Thursday.翻译:白宫周四证实，拜登政府负责亚洲事务的最高贸易官员莎拉·比安奇 (Sarah Bianchi) 即将辞职，美国贸易代表办公室在 11 月份未能达成协议后，正在规划与印太国家贸易谈判的下一步行动。
item.author: David Lawder

item.title: 美国敦促与中国讨论切实可行的降低核风险措施
item.description: The United States does not expect formal nuclear arms-control negotiations with China anytime soon, but does want to see a start of discussions on practical risk-reduction measures, a senior White House official said on Thursday.翻译:一位白宫高级官员周四表示，美国预计不会很快与中国进行正式的核军控谈判，但确实希望看到开始讨论实际的降低风险措施。
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国通过丝绸之路大型港口拓宽南美贸易高速公路
item.description: A Chinese mega port is rising on the Pacific coast, promising to turbo charge trade ties with South America.翻译:一个中国大型港口正在太平洋沿岸崛起，有望增强与南美的贸易关系。
item.author: Marco Aquino, Adam Jourdan

item.title: 为什么随着人口老龄化，人们对中国的养老金制度感到担忧？
item.description: China's ageing population threatens key Beijing policy goals for the coming decade of boosting domestic consumption and reining in ballooning debt, posing a severe challenge to the economy's long-term growth prospects.翻译:中国的人口老龄化威胁到北京未来十年刺激国内消费和控制债务膨胀的主要政策目标，对经济的长期增长前景构成严峻挑战。
item.author: Farah Master

item.title: 中国人口老龄化威胁转向新经济增长模式
item.description: Beijing's key policy goals for the coming decade of boosting domestic consumption and reining in debt face a threat.翻译:北京未来十年刺激国内消费和控制债务的主要政策目标面临威胁。
item.author: Farah Master

item.title: 对于许多中国人来说，经济感觉正陷入衰退
item.description: A crisis of confidence in the economy is deterring consumers from spending.翻译:对经济的信心危机正在阻碍消费者消费。
item.author: Casey Hall
